newsitem.title: USA: Health Systems Design CFO resigns.
newsitem.headline: Health Systems Design CFO resigns.

text.p: Health Systems Design Corp said its chief financial officer Richard Malone, has decided to leave the company and it named Steven Correia acting chief financial officer.
Before joining Health Systems more than two and a half years ago, Correia was a manager at an Oakland-based public accounting firm.

"Richard Malone has been a valuable member of our team over the last five years as we have grown rapidly and built Health System Design into a premier provider of managed care software," Chairman Richard Auger said. "We will miss him professionally and personally, and wish him well."
Health Systems Design provides managed care information systems to payors and providers of healthcare services.
